about_the_game:
Embark on the road of cultivating immortals and experience a different journey of ascension in "Fingertips Asking"!

The board is the world, elimination is the adventure, through three elimination to simulate the monk's transformation into the saint of the immortal cultivation experience.

In this game, you will experience the following:

🔮 Unique and novel match-3 gameplay

  • Eliminate 5 types of squares and absorb the corresponding resources to grow your cultivation and break through the shackles.

  • 10 realms, from body forging to ascension, each breakthrough can get more resources and strategies.

  • Powerful strategies for breakthroughs, 40 strategies for players to choose from.

  • 15 active skills can be used freely to control the challenge randomly.

  • Continuous elimination, group elimination, automatic elimination... a variety of elimination mechanisms to enjoy the pleasure of harvesting

⚡ Deeply compatible cultivation system

  • 24 holes to activate the marrow and tendons, bringing the qualitative growth of talent.

  • Scenario text, simulate the dynamic experience of the world

  • Sacrifice your own magic treasure, each of the 15 magic treasures has a unique effect, experience a more diverse cultivation experience!

  • ✨ game features

  • Strategy, operation and randomness coexist in the novelty of the three elimination experience, providing 20 hours of repeat play freshness

  • Immersive cultivation atmosphere, restore the cultivation experience.

short_description: Path of Dao is a unique match-3 cultivation simulator where Eastern mysticism meets addictive gameplay. Gather resources, cast abilities, and unlock strategies on your journey to immortality. Every match brings you closer to ascension as you master the way of cultivation.
